definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from

sentences.english: Buttermilk is added to soups and certain cheeses ;
sentences.chinese: 白脫牛奶備添加在湯或乾酪裏面。

sentences.english: Simple and classic: half a Farinette baguette spread with salted butter and Parisian ham.
sentences.chinese: 簡潔經典，一半原味法棍配上巴黎火腿和鹹白脫。

sentences.english: They make milk into butter and cheese.
sentences.chinese: 他們把牛奶製成白脫和奶酪。

sentences.english: Don't bring the plastic tub of margarine or sticks of butter to the table.
sentences.chinese: 千萬別把紙杯代黃油或很多塊白脫放到桌上。
